title: RealtimeAlertEvidenceSet
description: Evidence used to raise a realtime alert, typically derived from one or more feature windows and streams.

alertId.description: Identifier of the alert this evidence set is associated with.

windowId.description: Identifier of the feature window used to generate this evidence.

evidence.description: Evidence items specific to this alert.

name.description: Name of the evidence item or feature.

sourceStreamId.description: Identifier of the originating stream, if applicable.
